basis: User consistently described non-food coping actions (pause, environmental reset, breathing) and logging, with no mention of eating actions in the latest session turn.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user maintains alignment with the plan and BED mindfulness.
negative_thought_patterns: No persistent negative self-talk or hopelessness observed; slight vigilance around BED noted but not self-defeating.
emotional_triggers: Cravings and environmental food cues; BED mindfulness appears to influence response planning.
coaching_notes: Continue with supportive, non-judgmental tone; reinforce small, repeatable actions; gradually expand the repertoire of micro-actions; monitor for fatigue and need to revisit cognitive strategies; keep emphasizing BED mindfulness and immediate logging after actions.
